cards_moved_for_this_column_will_be_fini: Cards moved to this column will be considered as finished
principal_card_type_tooltip: Principal cards can have associated sub-card types
payment_routine_tooltip: An invoice will be generated in the informed period in accordance with the recurrence
pro_rata_tooltip: If enabled, a proportional invoice will be generated between the start or end date and the payment date
default_profile_id_tooltip: The selected profile will be redirected when logging in
show_to_profile_tooltip: If enabled, the employee will be able to see this information in their profile
problem_card_type_tooltip: These are cards that represent problems or impediments in the project
prepare_cycle_tooltip: Preparation cycles are not counted in the project duration period
util_hour_day_tooltip: Productive hours per day. Usually less than the daily work hours
